Risks and challenges
All of our authors are already hard at work on their books -- except for Chris Kohler, whose Final Fantasy V is ready for printing! Other books may take more time than we or the authors expect, as our Katamari book from Season 3 has done.

Boss Fight Books remains a press with only one full-time employee, and even with the help of the rest of the Boss Fight crew, accepting, editing, releasing, fulfilling, and promoting each of these books while supporting our authors with constant feedback and research help can be pretty intense. There may be some times in the next year where we are so inundated with tasks that it will take a few extra days to get back to your questions. That said, we promise to always keep you in the loop on how these books are coming, and to work with you if issues ever arise.

updates.update_userinfo: Last Season 4 Book Coming Soon: POSTAL by Brock Wilbur and Nathan Rabin
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone,
Postal is coming soon! April 7 to be precise, though we hope to have it out in the mail before then.
As usual, if you've got a paperback coming to you and you've moved: Please update your address on this Kickstarter campaign! Log into your Kickstarter account. Navigate to your Profile page. Select Backed Projects. Click Boss Fight Season 4. From your user menu select Survey and click Edit Address.
Thanks so much for your patience as this book has taken much longer than we ever thought it would. I think you're really going to enjoy the finished product -- and I can't wait to share the new books we've got waiting in the wings.

updates.update_content:
Hey Everybody,
I hope you're enjoying your ebook editions of Star Wars: KotOR by Alex Kane.
If you are getting a copy of the KotOR paperback and haven't updated your address, please do so. (Btw, I discovered that one of the $40 tiers had been previously turned off of allowing address changes, so I flipped it back on. Sorry about that!)

updates.update_userinfo: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic by Alex Kane has a release date!
updates.update_content:
Hey Everyone,
I'm happy to report that we've sent all the materials for Alex Kane's KotOR book off to the printers, and we're ready to announce a release date of 4/9/19. As always, we'll be sending copies out to Kickstarter backers as soon as we've got them.
The one VERY IMPORTANT THING is that if you have a paperback coming to you and you've moved, you MUST update your address on Kickstarter. Log in, click on the BFB Season 4 campaign, and change your address on there.

Hey Everybody,
Hope your holiday season is going well! A few items from us...
1. There's a StoryBundle ebook bundle going on now that features Shovel Knight and TEN other ebooks about video games (plus Magic: The Gathering) for $15.
2. For the holidays, we're offering 10% off everything in our store! Just enter the discount code HOLIDAY2018 or .

Hey Everybody,
I'm happy to report that Shovel Knight by David L. Craddock is finished and now with the printers. We will mail out paperback copies to you as soon as we have them in about one month's time, and we will send out ebook copies a little before that.
This book has been a labor of love for David and ourselves -- it's the length of our longest book, Spelunky, and like Spelunky it's brimming with insights about the creation of a hit indie game straight from the mouths of the developers themselves. I think you're really going to enjoy it.

Hi Everyone,  
I hope your long weekend is going great. 
First, I need to apologize to you for a couple of big things: 1. We're behind on our publishing schedule. 2. I should have been updating you about it. 
The blame on both counts falls on me. The authors, Mike, and everyone else involved in the press have been awesome as usual. It's just that I had some really consuming stuff pop up in my personal life and for awhile I had a hard time balancing it with all the demands of running this press. So I'm sorry to all of you -- and sorry especially to those of you who have been eager for updates. I never wanted to run one of THOSE Kickstarters, and I can tell you that in the future you're going to be hearing from us a lot more regularly.

Merry Winters, Everybody,
I've got a bunch of updates for you.
1. From now through Jan 7, you can get 10% off in our store by using the discount code HOLIDAY2017 at checkout. Combine that with our already discounted bundles and you're looking at some pretty great deals.

Hey Everybody,
Reminder that we're doing a PAX panel tomorrow! It's at 2:00 pm in the Cat Theater. I'd love to see you there, and please come say hi after. The authors and I are going to be doing a signing immediately after the panel. There will be some books for sale at the signing, and there will also be our books for sale at thePink Gorilla booth all weekend long.
If you're one of the 38 backers who hasn't filled out your survey, jump on it! We've got stuff to send you.

Hey Everybody,
The post-Kickstarter period is well underway. You should have received a survey from us asking for info, and there are still 124 backers who have not yet filled them out. Best to get it done now so you're sure to get your books. Those Final Fantasy V copies are just around the corner.
By the way, since sending out the surveys we've added a couple of t-shirt options: XXL and XXXL. So if you backed a t-shirt tier, I'll be emailing you again to see if you want one of the new sizes.
